}} The '1948â49 season' was Colchester United's sixth consecutive full season in
the Southern Football League. Colchester finished fourth in the league and
progressed to the first round of the FA Cup. They were runners-up in both the
1948 and 1949 finals of the Southern League Cup - both finals were played during
the 1948â49 season due to fixture congestion the previous season.
